description: Retrieves a list that describes the connection aliases used for cross-Region redirection. For more information, see Cross-Region Redirection for Amazon WorkSpaces.

parameters.name: AliasIds
parameters.description: The identifiers of the connection aliases to describe. (string) ---

nested_items.name: ConnectionAliases
nested_items.description: Information about the specified connection aliases.

nested_items.name: ConnectionString
nested_items.description: The connection string specified for the connection alias. The connection string must be in the form of a fully qualified domain name (FQDN), such as www.example.com.

nested_items.name: AliasId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the connection alias.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: The current state of the connection alias.

nested_items.name: OwnerAccountId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the Amazon Web Services account that owns the connection alias.

nested_items.name: Associations
nested_items.description: The association status of the connection alias.

nested_items.name: AssociationStatus
nested_items.description: The association status of the connection alias.

nested_items.name: AssociatedAccountId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the Amazon Web Services account that associated the connection alias with a directory.

nested_items.name: ResourceId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the directory associated with a connection alias.

nested_items.name: ConnectionIdentifier
nested_items.description: The identifier of the connection alias association. You use the connection identifier in the DNS TXT record when you're configuring your DNS routing policies.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The token to use to retrieve the next page of results. This value is null when there are no more results to return.
